title: Longhorns Daily News : Madison Booker , Team united states win gold at 2025 AmeriCup
body_text:
With a win over Brazil, Team USA clinched the tournament win for the 2025 FIBA AmeriCup. Led in part by Texas Longhorns star Madison Booker — Booker’s fourth goal medal so far — Team USA has now earned a spot in the 2026 FIBA Women’s World Cup in Berlin, Germany.
Longhorns Daily News: Madison Booker, Team USA win gold at 2025 AmeriCup
Plus: SEC Media Days on deck
